channel.title: Alexander Meuer
channel.description: This is where I talk about programming and projects.

item.title: First Jekyll post!
item.description: I have just upgraded my site to Jekyll! Instead of having a site and separate blog, I’ve decided to switch to jekyll; It looks super interesting and gives me yet another excuse to boot into ubuntu. I’ll be building this site up in small increments (during my breaks from coding my Final Year Project), but the fact that I can use markdown will mean I can get content out faster (as opposed to writing the html by hand or using blogger’s wysiwyg editor).
